name: Xaviera Techno Solutions
description: It has been almost 8 years, when our web solutions started with a small team. In 2010, we named ourselves as ‘Xaviera Techno Solutions’ – Your imagination, our creation. Enlightened with our epic rate of success and huge inflow of fresh projects, we decided to grow our team. Today, a team of highly experienced and versatile 20+ Creative Designers, 15+ Developers and 15+ Data Entry Operators work together to deliver you highly refined and splendid web service solutions.
